channel.title: Cyber Truck on Hugi's Elephant

item.title: Cyber Truck Roadtrip Plan
item.description: To make this a reality, a plan needs to be in place. First I need to be able to imagine it! Then I will be able to make it real. Ideas Brain Storming Places, Cities, Landmarks, Natural marvels, Activities, Paragliding, Scuba Diving, Cultural Events, Festivals, Natural Events, Celestial events, People to meet Family, Friends, Making connections Things I want to do Total Solar eclipse in [[2024-04-08 Monday]] 8:42 AM Learn and go Paragliding from popular flying spots

item.title: Northern lights road trip plan
item.description: One dream scenario that I want to make reality in the next several years is to go on a North America road trip with my wife in an electric camper truck. We can experience a few months of van truck life, but without burning gas, or worrying about finding a place to stay each night. I think with the right gear it can be a very simple yet comfortable trip. I have many places I would love to visit and experience.
